top.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
top.summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gvili’s return "an extraordinary achievement".

top.title: 'This is horrifying' - Minneapolis residents reel from second deadly shooting
top.summary: Two people have been shot dead by federal agents in the city in recent weeks, leaving many angry and frustrated.

top.title: France debates under-15s social media ban endorsed by Macron
top.summary: Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu has said he will use a fast-track procedure to get the legislation on the books by September.

top.title: Google to pay $68m to settle lawsuit claiming it recorded private conversations
top.summary: The claimants say Google Assistant recorded private conversations without their knowledge.

top.title: EU investigates Elon Musk's X over Grok AI sexual deepfakes
top.summary: The Commission will assess whether "manipulated sexually explicit images" have been shown to users in the EU.

top.title: TikTok US venture to collect precise user location data
top.summary: Details on the expanded access to location information was published in a new privacy policy for the popular social media app.
